sentences.en: Can you type a memo for me?
sentences.cn: 您能帮我打一份备忘录 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you look forward to distributing this memo to the department?
sentences.cn: 您要我把这份备忘录分发给整个部门 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you want me to send the memo out?
sentences.cn: 您要我把这份备忘录分发出去 吗 ?

sentences.en: He tapped Nim's memo with a fingernail.
sentences.cn: 他用指甲轻轻地弹了弹尼姆的备忘录.

sentences.en: I made a memo on my memo - pad to buy more coffee.
sentences.cn: 我在记事簿上记下了要再买些咖啡.

sentences.en: I sent him a memo reminding him about the meeting.
sentences.cn: 我发给他一个通知，提醒他开会的事。

sentences.en: I want this memo to go to all departmental managers.
sentences.cn: 这份备忘录要送交各部门的经理.

sentences.en: Nancy read the confidential memo carefully.
sentences.cn: 南希仔细地读了一遍这封密函.

sentences.en: Send the memo by express mail.
sentences.cn: 把这份备忘录用快递寄出.

sentences.en: She penned a short memo to his private secretary.
sentences.cn: 她给他的私人秘书写了一份简短的备忘录。

sentences.en: Some people received that memo in their office.
sentences.cn: 有些人是在他们的办公室里收到这份内部通知的.

sentences.en: The entire memo took up all of two pages.
sentences.cn: 整个备忘录写了满满两页纸。

sentences.en: This memo could be the smoking gun that investigators have been looking for.
sentences.cn: 这份备忘录可能是调查人员一直在寻找的证据。

sentences.en: We need 50 copies of this memo.
Yes. Please send the memo to the department.
sentences.cn: 好的,请把它分发给整个部门.

sentences.en: You'd better send the memo registered.
sentences.cn: 你最好把这份备忘录用挂号寄出.

trans.tran_en: a short official note to another person in the same company or organization
